thread.title: Colonial League, EPC soccer playoff updates for Oct. 20, 2015
thread.title_full: Colonial League, EPC soccer playoff updates for Oct. 20, 2015

title: Colonial League, EPC soccer playoff updates for Oct. 20, 2015
text:
The Colonial League and Eastern Pennsylvania Conference boys and girls soccer semifinals are set for Tuesday. 
Lehighvalleylive.com will have reporters at many of the games. 
Kyle Craig will be at Salisbury High School as Moravian Academy and Southern Lehigh boys start the night, followed by a girls matchup between Southern Lehigh and Palisades . 
The other half of the Colonial League action will be covered by Josh Folck at Northern Lehigh High School. Those games feature Northwestern against Salisbury in the boys semifinals and Saucon Valley against Northwestern in the girls semifinals. 
Greg Joyce will be at J. Birney Crum Stadium in Allentown as the EPC will be in action. Parkland and Nazareth will match up in girls, followed by Parkland and Emmaus in boys. 
Follow updates from those games in the comments section below.
